title: ISic002743. I.Sicily inscription 002743
body:
Facsimile Images

τοὶ Χιθαῖοι
ἀνέθηκαν
καὶ Πολέμαρχος
καὶ Γελλίας

Apparatus criticus

Text after Dubois IGDS II

English translation

The Chithaioi dedicated (this), both Polemarchos and Gellias

commentary
